name.en: Seminar of Numerical Groundwater Models IV
name.ch: 地下水數值模式專題討論IV

department.ch: 應用地質研究所碩士班

remark.en: Seminar of Numerical Groundwater Models Ⅱ、IV (Jointed)
remark.ch: 與AG7059地下水數值模式專題討論Ⅱ合班授課

goal.en: The objective of this course is to learn the numerical techniques for groundwater flow and contaminant transport simulation.
goal.ch: 本課程目標為讓學生習得地下水水流與汙染傳輸數值方法

content.en: Case study on the groundwater flow and contaminant transport.
content.ch: 地下水水流與汙染傳輸數值方法研究及案例討論。

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance
